com.digi.xbee.api.models

Enum SpecialByte

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SpecialByte>
      • com.digi.xbee.api.models.SpecialByte
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<SpecialByte>

    public enum SpecialByte
extends Enum<SpecialByte>
    Enumerates all the special bytes of the XBee protocol that must be escaped when working on API 2 mode.
    See Also:
    OperatingMode

    • Enum Constant Summary

      • escapeByte

        public int escapeByte()
        Escapes the byte by performing a XOR operation with 0x20 value.
        Returns:
        Escaped byte value.

      • get

        public static SpecialByte get(int value)
        Returns the SpecialByte entry associated with the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - Value of the SpecialByte to retrieve.
        Returns:
        SpecialByte associated to the given value, null if it does not exist in the list.

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Returns the special byte value.
        Returns:
        The special byte value.

      • isSpecialByte

        public static boolean isSpecialByte(int byteToCheck)
        Checks whether the given byte is special or not.
        Parameters:
        byteToCheck - Byte to check.
        Returns:
        true if given byte is special, false otherwise.
